name: Avoid unreferenced PLC Procedures & Functions (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all PLC Procedures or Functions that are not referenced i.e. not called.
output:
The report lists all the PLC unreferenced Procedures and Functions.

It provides following information: 
-  procedures and functions full name
rationale: Unreferenced artifacts like any other examples of dead code make maintenance more difficult and more expensive (modification of unused code).
total: Number of the PLC Procedures and Functions
